Introduction
This topic contains information on the effect of an insurance interpleader on claims for other benefits, including
deferring final homicide determination when insurance benefits are involved
, and
considering the conclusions of law of the court
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B  - Considering Eligibility When Homicide Is Involved
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
